page.title: 03THE HAMLET AND THE FAIR
page.content:
Other workshops include a charge room where the steel was stored,weighed and poured into moulds to form ingots,small hand forges where the roughly forged scythes were staightened and hardened. Additional features are late{18th. century} workman's cottages and a{19th. century manager's house,all furnished to show different life styles.
At the{Craft Fair,}held every year all the{little mesters}(self employed craftsmen) are invited. These make a variety of articles. One such craftsmen this year makes silver snuff boxes,thimbles with or without tops in brass,copper and silver,and candle snuffers. Another craftsman reproduces Bowie knives with handles of stag antler,mother of pearl and buffalo horn.
